data.name: Reviving the solar sector: Optimism in times of uncertainty
data.summary: The webinar will highlight appropriate interventions that can address the immediate and short term concerns of the solar sector. We will deliberate on the key medium and long term interventions that may be required to regain the momentum needed to meet the 175 GW and the 450 GW target. Optimism in times like these will not only ensure better preparation for tomorrow but increase our tolerance to absorb any fallouts due to uncertainty.
data.speakers:
Parag Sharma, O2 Power
Subrahmayam Pulipaka, National Solar Energy
Rishabh Jain, CEEW-CEF
